title: (Tiv) Six steps to harvesting more than 20 tons per hectare of cassava with improved weed control

tasks.task: Participate in cassava farming tasks in Africa.
subtasks: Plant cassava shoots in the field.
Apply agricultural chemicals (e.g., glyphosate) to the plants.
